1:
Those who trust in Yahweh\q are like Mount Zion, unshakable, forever enduring.
\q
2:
As the mountains surround Jerusalem,\q so Yahweh surrounds his people
\q now and forever.
\q
3:
The scepter of wickedness must not rule in the land of the righteous.\q Otherwise the righteous might do what is wrong.


\q
4:
Do good, Yahweh, to those who are good\q and to those who are upright in their hearts.
\q
5:
But as for those who turn aside to their crooked ways,\q Yahweh will lead them away with the evildoers.
\q May peace be on Israel.
